TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAuthenticationClaimResource extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示从 创建的声明的资源类型。

span.span: Represents the resource type for a claim that is created from a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类创建 身份验证声明的 实例。Use the class to create a instance for a authentication claim. 类具有一个构造函数，它采用可以将该类传递到的资源作为参数。The class has a constructor that takes a resource, which this class can be passed to. 安全令牌使用 SAML 断言指定其声明，这些断言可指定何时对主题进行身份验证。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated. SAML 断言中的声明由 SAML 语句表示。The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. SAML 规范定义了一组 SAML 语句类型，其中一个类型为 。The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a . 断言语句的主题在特定时间、以特定方式进行身份验证。A asserts that the statement's subject is authenticated by a particular means at a particular time. 类表示 的声明资源。The class represents a claim resource for the .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 身份验证方法集是可扩展的；但是，下表包含 SAML 规范中定义的身份验证方法集。The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification. |身份验证方法Authentication method|URIURI| |---------------------------|---------| |PasswordPassword|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:passwordurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password| |KerberosKerberos|urn:ietf:rfc:1510urn:ietf:rfc:1510| |安全远程密码 (SRP)Secure Remote Password (SRP)|urn:ietf:rfc:2945urn:ietf:rfc:2945| |硬件令牌Hardware Token|URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareTokenURI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken| |基于 SSL/TLS 证书的客户端身份验证SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication|urn:ietf:rfc:2246urn:ietf:rfc:2246| |PGP 公钥PGP Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGPurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP| |SPKI 公钥SPKI Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKIurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI| |XKMS 公钥XKMS Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMSurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS| |XML 数字签名XML Digital Signature|urn:ietf:rfc:3075urn:ietf:rfc:3075| |未指定Unspecified|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecifiedurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified|
